results.description:
Use LinkedIn to navigate your career with confidence--whether you want to find a new job, keep in touch with your network, or stay up-to-date on the latest from your connections and your industry.

Get the app to access the full features and functionality of LinkedIn--anytime, anywhere.

Why you’ll love using the LinkedIn app:

1. Browse and get recommended jobs that fit. Apply easily to millions of openings right from the app.
2. Get alerted to stay on top of active conversations, the latest news and new opportunities.
3. Use Find Nearby and QR code scanner features to easily find and connect to people you meet on-the-go.

YOUR PROFILE
• Use your LinkedIn profile as a virtual resume
• Highlight your accomplishments, responsibilities, and experience
• Add a picture to help people you know and potential employers find you

YOUR NETWORK
• Find friends, classmates, and colleagues to add to your network
• See updates on their activity and reach out via the app to stay in touch
• Follow companies, influencers, and topics you’re interested in

JOB SEARCH
• Search and apply to millions of openings
• Upload and easily submit your resume to jobs that fit
• Save searches and create alerts to be the first to know about new openings
• Reach out to connections at companies you’re interested in for referrals and advice, to increase your chances of hearing back

LATEST NEWS AND CONTENT
• Share articles, comments, and knowledge with your network
• Learn about what’s happening in your industry with curated content
• Follow hashtags for timely updates on topics you care about the most

GET MORE OUT OF LINKEDIN BY USING THE APP
• Find nearby: allows you to connect to people in your vicinity
• QR code scanner: share your unique code so people can connect with you instantly
• Push notifications: know immediately when someone responds or wants to connect

Whether you want to find a new job, share your knowledge, build your professional reputation, or if you just need a lightweight way to stay in touch--get started with the LinkedIn app today.


The LinkedIn app is free to use and download.
---------------------------

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools to find a job, grow your business, find sales leads, or hire talent--priced from $29.99 monthly to $119.95 monthly.

Subscriptions will automatically renew each month and be charged to your iTunes account within 24-hours of the end of the current period, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Scan business cards and turn them into contacts instantly with Contact Snapper. Simply take a picture of your business card and let Contact Snapper do the trick. Contact Snapper will scan the card and all the details will be automatically entered into the desired contact fields. Like magic. 

+++ Try it for free and save up to 3 contacts! +++ 

SAVE TIME 
You no longer need to tap on your keyboard to create contacts, let your iPhone do it for you. 

SIMPLE and EFFICIENT 
Adding a Contact can be as simple as 2 finger-taps. With a photo as source, Contact Snapper uses a very efficient OCR technology to transform the picture to text. 

INTERNATIONAL 
Contact Snapper covers 200+ countries, including Asiatic languages. No other card scanner App can compare to Contact Snapper's language capabilities. 

PRECISE 
Contact Snapper doesn't stop there. The App is actually able to identify and separate captured text and assign it to specific fields to fit each country’s conventional phone and postal format. 

GMAIL CONTACTS
Contact Snapper includes a two-way fully managed synchronisation with your Gmail Contacts. You can create contacts directly in your Gmail account by scanning a business card on your device.

FREE LIMITED VERSION 
Contact Snapper allows you to “try before you buy”. A limited version, complete with all features and supported languages, is offered so you can judge it for yourself, saving up to 3 contacts. If this App meets your expectations you can then purchase it directly without any additional download. 

IPHONE AND IPAD
Contact Snapper works on both iPhone and iPad at no extra cost. Once you purchase Contact Snapper on one of your devices, it can be installed on all the others free.

PRIVACY POLICY 
We take Privacy very seriously and adhere to a strict and simple policy. We encourage you to review our privacy policy, available in iTunes, as well as in the App. 

Contact Snapper - the most advanced way to add a contact to your address book …. great value for business and private use.

Avec notre plateforme d’emploi, vous avez tout ce qu’il vous faut pour votre recherche d’emploi !

Pourquoi utiliser l’application jobup.ch ? 

1 – ACCÉDEZ GRATUITEMENT À TOUS LES JOBS de Suisse romande depuis une seule application. jobup.ch, plateforme n°1 de l’emploi en Suisse romande, vous propose le plus grand nombre d’offres d’emploi ainsi qu’un large choix d’entreprises.

2 – RECHERCHE PAR MOT-CLÉ : Votre profession figure dans plusieurs secteurs et catégories ? Pas de problème, vous pouvez aussi utiliser la recherche par mot-clé pour trouver votre prochain emploi.

3 – RECHERCHE PAR ENTREPRISE & ÉVALUATIONS D’ENTREPRISES : Faites-vous une idée de votre prochain employeur grâce aux portraits d’entreprise. Évaluez vos employeurs ainsi que les entreprises où vous avez postulé et obtenez un aperçu du fonctionnement d’employeurs potentiels grâce aux évaluations des autres utilisateurs.

4 – RECHERCHES RÉCENTES : Gagnez du temps en consultant vos dernières recherches effectuées car nous les avons sauvegardées pour vous.

5 – SUIVEZ DES ENTREPRISES : Suivez les entreprises qui vous intéressent et vous recevrez une notification automatique lorsque de nouvelles offres d’emploi ou évaluations de ces dernières sont publiées.

6 – POSTULEZ directement : Postulez via l’application grâce à votre profil jobup.ch ou votre adresse email.

7 – JOBMAILER : Ne ratez plus aucune opportunité d’emploi grâce aux notifications push, qui vous informent des dernières offres d’emploi publiées.

8 – SAUVEGARDEZ DES OFFRES D’EMPLOI : Pendant vos déplacements, sauvegardez les annonces intéressantes en cliquant simplement sur le cœur. Vous les trouverez ensuite sous « Mes emplois ». Conseil : Une fois que les offres d’emploi ne sont plus en ligne, vous pouvez toujours y avoir accès si vous les avez sauvegardées.

9 – MON PROFIL personnel : Créez votre profil sur notre application et personnalisez votre recherche d’emploi.

10 – Recherche PERSONNALISÉE : Nous vous soutenons de façon personnalisée dans votre recherche en mettant à votre disposition des catégories et des filtres de recherche.

11 – FEEDBACK : Il vous manque une fonctionnalité ? Ou peut-être avez-vous des suggestions concernant notre application ? Contactez-nous directement grâce au formulaire intégré ou par email à l’adresse candidat@jobup.ch.

12 – RECOMMANDATION : Une offre d’emploi vous a fait penser à un(e) ami(e) ? Partagez l’annonce grâce à la fonction de recommandation.

Bonne chance pour votre recherche d’emploi avec notre application !
Votre équipe jobup.ch

results.releaseNotes: Looking for top security and ultimate privacy for your LinkedIn, Facebook and Gmail accounts? SpotTheSpy has it all! New in this update is several security enhancements.
results.description:
Is someone seeing all your private emails? What about your facebook messages? Is someone spying on those?  

Spot the Spy will let you know! 

Find out how many intruders are spying on your private information. Prevent them from changing the passwords and closing you out of your accounts. 

How? Spot the Spy is a breaking new technology that alerts you immediately when someone hacks into one of your private accounts. 
Through the GPS in the your phone SpotTheSpy is able to determine your location and compare it with where your account is being used. SpotTheSpy will alert you if your accounts are being used from a different location than where you are.
If you fear your account has been accessed by an intruder, the app enables you to sign out all devices, change your password or enable two-step verification. Thus, ensure that you once again is the only one having access to your account.

Why do I need SpotTheSpy? 

*** 73% of Americans have fallen victim to some type of cyber crime. 
*** Over 40,000 online identity thefts happen every day. 
*** Cyber-attacks happened in 2017 at double the rate of 2016.  
*** The Big Asian Leak: 185 billion customers affected. 

What you get: 

Security 24/7 

Privacy From People That Want to Spy On You  

Protect your money and your personal information, download the App Now 

Immediately receive a notification if your Gmail, Facebook or LinkedIn accounts are being used from somewhere that is not your current location. If you are at work and someone reads your mail at home we can warn you. 

With SpotTheSpy's complete security solution you’ll only need one app to control your security across all of your online accounts.  

How to use SpotTheSpy: 
- Install the app on your smartphone 
- SpotTheSpy asks for your permission to send you emails informing you about security issues if you don’t want to receive those feel free to decline the offer
- SpotTheSpy asks​ for your permission to use your location to be able to send you location-specific alerts. If you do not grant SpotTheSpy permission to do so, you will not receive any alerts from the app. You can always change this in your iPhone’s settings
- Choose the account or accounts you want SpotTheSpy to protect 
- SpotTheSpy does by no means share your data with any third parties or store any of your private information on servers. When logging into your account you are logging directly your account through either Facebook, Gmail or LinkedIn, which has nothing to do with SpotTheSpy. 
- SpotTheSpy will send you a notification if there is any unwanted activity on your accounts 
- If you receive a notification, you can react by logging out all other devices and changing your password  
- You can check your notification history whenever it suits you in “History” in the menu 

If you have any questions or feedback do not hesitate to get in touch with us. 
Send us an email at info@Spotthespy.com or add us to Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpotTheSpy/

Simplifier les échanges entre candidats et recruteurs, accompagner l’évolution sociétale du marché, et contribuer à réduire le nombre de chômeurs, ça la mission de Emploi.ml.   

Emploi.ml propose aujourd’hui une alternative mobile, gratuite et efficace pour la recherche d’emploi et le recrutement

Les candidats et recruteurs peuvent directement échanger par chat au sein de l’application

Nos services s’inscrivent parfaitement dans les grandes tendances socio-économiques actuelles à savoir :

•Répond à la problématique de plus en plus complexe à laquelle sont confrontés les recruteurs en au Mali
•Répondre à l’enjeu stratégique de la détection de talents et du recrutement pour les postes middle et top management
•Suivre la tendance de l’africanisation des talents souhaités par les opérationnels et les RH
•Être en mesure de s’adresser à l’ensemble des candidats dans toute leur diversité : talents de la diaspora, binationaux, cadres locaux, occidentaux expatriés, mobilité intra-africaine…

results.description:
FreelancerViet.vn là sàn giao dịch việc làm tự do đầu tiên tại Việt Nam kết nối nhà tuyển dụng với freelancer.
Chúng tôi tạo ra 1 sàn giao dịch công việc tự do cho các Nhà tuyển dụng (Job-Owner) đăng việc tìm người thực hiện tốt nhất hoặc chủ động tìm kiếm các freelancer theo mong muốn. Thành viên tại FreelancerViet dễ dàng tạo 1 profile cá nhân với portfolio hoàn chỉnh, tạo sự thuận tiện khi thể hiện năng lực bản thân trong cộng đồng và với khách hàng, dễ dàng tìm thấy công việc phù hợp tăng thêm thu nhập.

Giao dịch của Chủ dự án và Freelancer được thực hiện an toàn và đảm bảo thông qua chức năng “Giữ cọc dự án” trên freelancerViet.

FreelancerViet được biết đến thông qua cộng đồng Facebook từ năm 2010, bản Beta trên website hoạt động từ tháng 9 năm 2013, đến Tháng 3 năm 2015 bản chính thức ra đời với hơn 35,000 thành viên và tổng giá trị dự án lên hơn 12 tỷ đồng với 2,500 công việc.

FreelancerViet hiện đang được sở hữu bởi Công ty Cổ Phần Dịch Vụ Nhân Sự và Truyền Thông Flamingo. Là 1 trong những dự án online quan trọng mang tầm chiến lược của công ty. Theo kế hoạch, FreelancerViet sẽ được đầu tư phát triển mạnh mẽ hơn để trở thành nơi tìm việc freelance tin cậy cho cộng đồng và giúp doanh nghiệp tiết kiệm đáng kể chi phí nhân sự.

results.description:
大街—招聘神器，让好工作主动找你！

当别人在苦苦搜索工作，你只要一键设置，就可以坐等HR发来邀约；当别人在四处打探公司内幕，你只要一键查询，公司薪水八卦全部曝光；当别人为错过机会而懊恼，你只要一键制定，就能随时随地接收投递反馈。
【实时机会】
实时接收最新的招聘职位、校招计划、面经攻略！
【私人定制】
随心订阅职位，精准推送符合你心意的优质机会！
【一键投递】
快捷投递简历、报名宣讲会，不错过任何好机会！
【实时消息】
随时随地接收投递反馈和HR留言，及时掌握进度！
【公司内幕】
几百万家公司的员工点评、薪水爆料，无价之宝！

【功能详解】
1、职位订阅
支持手机自定义订阅企业招聘全职、兼职以及实习职位，使求职者更加轻松寻找到合适的工作；
2、机会分类
机会分类展现，全职、校招、实习、兼职各类招聘职位任求职者挑选；
3、职位工资
求职者可轻松获取招聘职位的工资信息，无论全职、实习还是兼职岗位的工资不再是秘密；
4、简历管理
手机管理个人简历，求职者可以根据企业的招聘职位情况，随时编辑更新；
5、职位收藏
求职者可收藏感兴趣企业的全职职位，学生用户可收藏相关校招和实习兼职职位，不要漏掉每一个好机会；
6、投递反馈
及时查看招聘企业HR给出的投递反馈，求职进展、校招进程随时掌握；
7、职位邀约
招聘企业主动发起邀约，及时查看职位邀约，让机会找到你；
8、职位搜索
支持分类搜索，全职职位、名企校招、公司动态、实习职位任求职者搜索；
校招
学生用户专设校招求职专用通道，企业校招计划轻松获取；
10、实习
实习岗位一键获取，在关注校招的同时，方便学生用户轻松找到更合适的实习工作；
11、公司
公司频道帮求职者了解各家公司的招聘职位、校招计划、笔试面试攻略、公司点评、工资福利等；
12、发现
发现频道可以进行公司互动，讨论 招聘职位的工资、查看公司八卦，挑战职场小游戏。
 
【用户答疑】
1、刚上大一，注册大街网有什么用？
一方面可以找暑假、寒假的实习工作、课余兼职工作，积累社会经验；还可以查看企业校招计划、关注公司动态为日后参与企业校招、寻找全职工作做准备。
2、本人已有全职工作，想找份兼职工作，又怕在其他网站被骗？
用大街网找兼职工作不用担心，无论是全职职位、兼职职位还是实习职位，我们都有严格的审核体系，对招聘职位进行严格把关，保证安全可靠！
3、企业发布的招聘职位的工资怎么了解？
招聘企业在发布职位是会标注工资信息，如果没标注工资的职位，可以进入到该公司的公司互动页面，求职者可以在里面了解到工资等各类信息，学生用户还能了解到校招职位、实习以及兼职岗位的工资情况。
4、想找实习和兼职工作，怎么了解这个招聘企业？
可以到公司点评里面查看该招聘企业员工的点评，还可了解求职者互相发的笔试面试攻略，以及职位的工资信息，或许还可以找到能一起实习的小伙伴。
5、怎样了解企业的详细校招计划？
注册大街网，进入校招页面，有海量的企业的校招职位以及详细的校招计划，同时你还能看到该企业的其他全职、实习以及兼职的职位、员工的工资福利等一些招聘企业列详细的信息。
6、求职者怎样订阅合适自己的职位？
注册大街网，点击职位订阅，根据行业、职位、地点、工资等关键字选择合适求职者自身的职位订阅关键字，这样合适的全职、兼职、以及学生用户的校招、实习等职位会定时推送给您，不会漏掉任何一个求职机会。

7、某些全职职位的工资真实吗？
被标注的无论全职、兼职还是实习的工资信息都是招聘企业HR发布，经过审核后的，可以作为求职参考。
 
【用户评价】
1、校招的职位好多，投递简历真的好方便，今天投了几十个企业的校招职位，希望能找到好工作！
2、找工作变得更加方便，真是求职者的好帮手，本来想找全职的工作，偶然得到了个兼职的工作也不错，会继续用下去的。
3、有企业的人力发来邀约，感觉还挺靠谱的，现在的招聘企业都这么主动吗？老给我发都想换工作了呢，发来的职位工资都好高啊。
4、各家公司的面经、求职攻略看看还是挺有帮助的，为以后换工作提供参考。
5、招聘职位的工资直接标红处理了，第一眼就能看见醒目的工资，真是来仇恨呢！
6、感觉对大学生找工作更有着帮助，校招企业面试、笔试讨论的还挺激烈的。
7、用起来很舒服，能看到职位工资，谁看过简历还给发提醒，是找工作的神器！
8、推荐的招聘职位还挺合适的，写简历还挺简单的，直接用手机投简历，很方便。
9、想找实习的大三狗在上面找实习工作还挺容易的，大四的校招和以后找全职、兼职工作就靠你了！
10、找工作用上的，定位什么的很喜欢，全职职位非常多，兼职的工作在丰富点就更好了，是求职的好工具。
11、一直以为大街的校招很厉害，看了下招聘的全职岗位也很多，资源很丰富。企业的校招现在都好难啊，还是先找个实习工作积累下经验，希望能找到个靠谱的实习长经验。
12、某些兼职职位的工资都有发布，真的是很全面，下载一个用来找兼职挺方便的。
13、查看在招全职职位的时候可以根据自己的需要来筛选，挑起来还比较轻松。
14、无论是全职还是实习职位都标注了工资、地点、要求，不用再反复点进去看，省时省力。

results.description:
Bloop Connect’s (Bloop) aim is to improve upon the way personal and professional information is exchanged and shared while bridging the gap between the physical and virtual identities.  

Bloop is modernizing on an age-old paradigm for sharing information that has fallen out of fashion, namely the business card.  We seek to change the dynamic of this whole information exchange process by introducing a virtual identity that can be both effectively and selectively exchanged without the need for typing, that is all within the information owner’s control right from the one device that everyone has with them all the time, their cell phone.  

New to Bloop
The first thing a new user needs to do is to create their own virtual identity.  The first time you install Bloop the application, you will be walked through the creation process.  We’ll try to capture your contact information from your phone.  All you need to do is fill in any information, and you're done.  

Using Bloop
A Bloop user takes on two roles: 1. Information Provider and 2. Information Collector.  Simply stated, a Provider displays their virtual identity to a Collector, then in the case of two-way information exchange, the roles are reversed.  

With Bloop you can:

• Share contact information without the need to type.
• Store captured information within Bloop and selectively push to your phone's default contacts
• Share Linked-In Credentials allowing for fast, efficient, painless on-going connections.
• Share links hyperlinks to documents or files

Bloop Asks for the following permissions:

Camera Usage
Bloop uses your camera to camera to capture another user's electronic profile

Contacts
If granted, Bloop can move selected records from its own database into your phone's contacts.

Contacts Cleaning Manager for iPhone allows you to backup phone data in one click. Transfer your contacts from and to iPhone, Gmail, iCloud, Hotmail and Yahoo! or keep full backups of your iPhone address book on your PC. 

► HOW TO RESTORE data:
1. go to the Restore tab
2. select the date you wish to restore 
3. (if you want) select the elements you wish to restore. 

These days, our devices are literally crammed with contacts, so much so that sooner or later we all face duplicate contacts. Using Contacts Cleaning Manager’s app data extraction, you can easily gain extra storage space, and remove all the duplicate contacts with similar numbers and email address.

► FEATURES:
• Back up to an address book contact
• Schedule backups to run whenever and however frequently you want
• Back up everything or just a selected contact
• The ability to share your backups with others
• Backups are firmware independent
• Helpful documentation

Contacts Cleaning Manager overcomes one of iOS’s major flaw, allowing you to backup and restore iOS contacts data. And it’s super easy!

Blonk is a job search and professional networking app using AI and video to help you find job opportunities and like-minded people through simple swipes. After a mutual like, you can chat directly and enjoy fruitful meetings!

START THE BLONK WAY: SWIPE. CHAT. MEET Choose what you want to present about yourself and your motivations.  Selected opportunities come directly to you. Accept or decline in a swipe, and let Blonk’s algorithm learn your preferences. Don’t settle. Only pursue opportunities that are a great fit!   FIND THE RIGHT JOB 
Blonk is transforming the job search experience.  You get direct connections across borders. After a match, you can engage directly with the hiring manager through chat and video wherever you are, wherever they are. 
 Quick and simple job hunt: 1. Download Blonk app and register
2. Tell us about yourself (record a video, attach resume..) and your objectives (look for a job, job fields, sectors, locations..) 3. Instantly receive curated job opportunities according to your preferences 4. Swipe right or like to apply. When there is a mutual like, you get a match and you can start chatting straightaway! 5. Validate key elements through chat and get a meeting as soon as possible 
MEET THE RIGHT PEOPLE (NEW! Beta)
Make personal connections to build projects, find co-founder or talents. Many opportunities are hidden or fast evolving in this constantly changing landscape. Getting the right opportunity is increasingly a matter of finding and engaging the right people at the right time. 

Blonk gives you the opportunity to network easily with like-minded people in an efficient and casual way. Thanks to an intuitive design, powerful matching algorithms and functionalities like geolocation and video, we bring you new ways to network and make meaningful professional connections that will lead to concrete opportunities.

Business networking app geared for action:
1. We help the right people connect in a few swipes and chats. We redefine networking experience using AI to help you meet inspiring people and find valuable opportunities.
2. Networking can be efficient and fun. Meet inspiring and like-minded people to discover unexpected opportunities, just by swiping for 1 min a day! Swipe. Match. Meet.  

CREATE OR JOIN GROUPS AND EVENTS
Meaningful networking is a rich source of professional serendipity. On Blonk, you can multiply ways to get to know more people. You can build or join communities, organize events and invite people to groups and events. By making networking a daily habit. you can significantly widen your network, generate vibrant group interactions and get directly or indirectly access to hidden opportunities!

Blonk helps you build and grow vibrant communities:
1. Browse existing groups or events and join your preferred ones based on themes and hashtags
2. Invite friends to join the groups and events and get them to invite their own network too
3. As soon as you joined, you can chat with the group and engage individually each member
4. Create your own groups or events to generate the networking environment that fits best your style and ambition
 We want to transform the search for professional opportunities. We make things simple, removing frustrations and inefficiencies in the recruitment process and traditional networking at every step. There are no useless, lengthy nor complex process, you get direct access to opportunities and you can gauge very quickly key capabilities as well as mutual interest across geographies. With Blonk, you can find great opportunities! 
For support, please get in touch with us at: hello@blonk.co
You can consult our privacy policy here: http://www.blonk.co/privacy-en
If you love the app, 5-star reviews can really help us out!

Check us out on:

* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blonkco/

results.description:
Social media platforms keep changing their image sizes and formats and all graphic designers have to keep up with the updates to ensure their content looks good on all platforms. 

That's why we built the first Social Media Design Cheatsheet on iOS. 

For all major platforms (listed below), we listed all the main assets designers are used to creating and for each asset we have listed the optimal size as well as best practice and additional details that will help you get your pixels right. 

Platforms supported: 
- Facebook 
- Twitter
- LinkedIn
- Instagram 
- Google+ 
- Pinterest 
- Whatsapp 
- Youtube 

Whenever a platform is updated, we update the app accordingly so you are constantly up-to-date with the latest sizes and formats. 

The app covers social media assets, image posts, video posts, and advertising formats and provides sizes in pixels, aspect ratio, video specs, max weight, length and so on. We focus our best practice to what you really need to create good content, no noise, just what's needed.

We're also open to cover additional platforms and have built in a way for designer and marketers to reach out to us and request add-ons. 

Also feel free to reach out to us at socialmediadesigncheatsheet@gmail.com

results.trackCensoredName: Earth Invasion - Galaxy Aliens vs United Alliance
results.trackName: Earth Invasion - Galaxy Aliens vs United Alliance
results.description:
[ Storyline ]

Once upon a time, there was a... No, no, no, this is not a any fairytale, this is true story of alien invasion to the earth. Huge among of alien troops attacks to earth planet and your goal is to guide and lead United Alliance to victorious battle and wipe out aliens out of galaxy. Aliens have conquered galaxies and planets one by one, but now it's time to stop them finally, before their actually reach our precious tellus planet.
People in earth are huge danger, alien troops have big technology advantage and huge waves of soldiers. Aliens are also really nasty creatures, their have big teeth and poison tentacles. Only good strategy and great logical moves can save our planet middle on this invasion. You can start to strike back one wave at a time and try to kill as many enemies as possible with a single move, you don't have afford any mistakes. Because you are fight in front line, you have to plan your and Alliance battalion moves carefully and strike back at full force all the time. Now it's time real war action and you need to kick them butt out of world. You specify the path to the fate of the human race...

[ Aliens background ]

Alien race is more or less a hybrid cross between a spider and octopus. They can move really fast using tentacles. Alien queen can birth alien eggs really fast and they grow to adults quite short time period, so their number is growing rapidly. Aliens are from Sirius Nebula and they conquered lots of planets. Their technology is a few hundred a year ahead of us and they have already developed teleportation. Luckily our latest laser weapons can destroy their star ships and blow their slime bodies away.
Aliens started their journey couple hundred years ago and started to conquer the universe. They have been victorious when they travelled around universe and their number has grown to billions. They seem to think that there is no race that can fight back and they are superior race in the Universe. Maybe this is their only weakness.

[ How to play ]

You control your strikes by selecting alien or group of aliens by your finger. This will destroy aliens which are connected together with a telepathic link. Alien telepathic link is connected when aliens touching others horizontally or vertically and their are coloured with a same colour. There are six different coloured alien orcs (red, blue, green, yellow, purple and oranges). So you have to plan your strikes well so you could make huge link between aliens. You have two rounds to make a strike before new wave is coming closer. If aliens reach the earth, it's end of mankind living on globe. You really need to grow your experience and intelligence to finally reach the victory of the battle.

Are you ready on this battle and rescue world nations globally and protect our beautiful planet. Last man standing!

[ Identity Orcs ]
Red Orc is Lurker Soldier which trying to sneak attack you from behind
Blue Orc is Warrior which attack with using terrific force and can reap you to pieces
Green Orc is Mind Reader which scan your brain with a telepathic means
Yellow Orc is War Lord, which burn his enemies with a flame thrower
Purble Orc is War Captain and using his poison tentacles and recover really fast
Orange Orc is Technology Wizard, which is responsible for equipment functionality and can reset earth defence system and weapons.

[ Alliance Forces ]
You are the commander of the United Alliance and lead the army. Battalions equipped with the latest weapons technology.

[ Features ]
- Hiscore tables (best scores, killed green orcs, killed blue orcs, killed red orcs, killed yellow orcs, killed purple orcs and killed orange orcs)
- Logical puzzle (this is almost like a one man chess game)
- Easy controls
- Easy gameplay
- Hours of fun
- Highly fun and addictive game
- Easy to play anywhere and anytime
- Automaticly save game state

results.releaseNotes: Updated screenshots
results.description:
The purely digital alternative to the common business card.

SwoopMeet completely takes away the necessity to carry a business card. Simply create your own in-app business card by choosing a theme and add any information you would want to pass on to a new contact. Then, at your next networking event, have your new associates just scan the unique QR code connected to your business card and they instantly have all of your contact info at the touch of a finger.

Save money and wallet space – you’ll never have to shuffle the burden of business cards again. 

How many times have you changed jobs, positions or even careers? And every change in job title requires a new business card with new contact information to carry around and hand out.

And what happens with all those cards you collect at networking events? Or even just the person you met while you were out at dinner last night with that amazing job opportunity? Chances are, you have a pile of business cards that you’re afraid to throw away because there’s definitely a possibility that you might reach out to one of them for something. But what do you do with them in the meantime?

Not to mention those times when you met that perfect business contact but you just realized you forgot to restock your own cards in your wallet! That cocktail napkin with your phone number will definitely hold up in their pocket. Right.

Why not just skip the entire process? Everything else is digital nowadays – shouldn’t one of the most obnoxious business trends finally evolve as well?

SwoopMeet completely takes away the necessity to carry a business card. Simply choose a theme in the app for your card and add any information you would want to pass on to a new contact. Then, at your next networking event, have your new associates just scan the unique QR code connected to your business card and they instantly have all of your contact info at the touch of a finger.

What about being in a loud, crowded area and trying to give someone your email or phone number? No more yelling about how to spell your name – “Did you say ‘Brian’ or ‘Ryan’??” – just have them scan the code!

Floyd is a professional networking app that connects you to the companies, people and opportunities that are most relevant to you, ensuring that you are getting the most possible value out of your first face-to-face encounters. Exchange digital content, message new and hopeful contacts and see the latest opportunities around you. Floyd uses the latest in proximity technology to update your location at an event in real-time with incredible accuracy, so you know where the people you need to talk to are and how to get to them. results.description:
Your truffls job app: Get the job you deserve.

Simply apply from anywhere.
Without motivational letters. Without hours of searching. On a par with recruiters.

HOW IT WORKS

1. Fill in your application profile: in the app, on your PC or by connecting to XING.
2. Let truffls suggest jobs to you: every swipe improves your future job results.
3. Swipe interesting jobs to the right: one swipe = one application.
4. Communicate on a par with recruiters: text with companies who indicated interest in your profile.

YOUR TRUFFLS' ADVANTAGES 

•   Easy setup, even easier usage: take time to fill in your truffls profile and apply by swiping right.
•   Seamless handling: fill in your truffls profile or upload documents on your PC - apply by swiping on your phone.
•   Personal touch: after a match, you can send messages and documents like certificates etc. to recruiters.
•   Refine your job suggestions: use positive and negative keywords to see more of the jobs you like - and less of those you don't.
•   Don't worry about wrong spontaneous decisions: simply shake your phone to fetch back that job you just swiped.
•   We are your career advisors: we'll help you optimize your profile and have tons of tips for your job search - text us in the messenger.

We work hard on improving your truffls experience, and you can help us with that: drop us a line at info@truffls.com to let us know about your wishes or to give us feedback. If you like truffls, please rate us in the app store. 

And now, have fun discovering jobs and being discovered!

results.trackName: 机构际客-让机构与世界互联
results.description:
机构际客是为大中华圈机构用户定制打造的社交化广义O2O大数据网络软件，包括O2O、B2C和B2B等电子商务服务模式，是机构用户与个人在同一个社交化的大数据平台上实现全时交流、全视角互动的生态圈。
使用独创的12位用户号码 — 际号，机构社交、集合式通信和个人社交无缝集成在统一的互联网平台上，共享海量数据。为中国企业机构提供社交化的广义O2O整体解决方案。
机构际客为VIP用户提供12项基于PC端和移动APP两种终端的专项服务，包括但不限于：
1．机构7层级际号段主页管理系统，精准映射机构内部的管理序列；
2．集合式集团通信：包括只用4位号码拨叫的实时音视频，按权限管理的IM即
时通信及主页邮箱；
3．VIP机构星标认证；
4．招聘发布模块；
5．产品发布模块；
6．采购信息发布模块； 
7．投融资项目发布模块； 
8．用户及上下游商业伙伴群组； 
9．线上活动发布模块； 
10．机构SNS平台全景展示，包括动态信息、博客、图片和视频；
11．机构际客（4000开头的际号）用户之间，使用8位号码拨叫音视频；
12．主页推荐和目标用户群精准推送，机构与个人之间的集合式通信，企业邮箱。
为个人用户提供的免费服务包括：
社交部分（SNS）：信息流、主页、博客、群组、活动等；
集合式通信（UC）部分：实时通信（IM）、基于最新技术的实时音视频电话、数据传输和电子邮箱，为个人找工作、找朋友和进阶教育提供全面服务。

理论基础：内源搜索引擎。
商业模式：社交化的广义O2O大数据平台。
核心价值：以N层级主页集合系统映射机构内部的管理关系，在每一层级的主页上集成信息发布模块和集合式通信工具。为机构的内部管理和电子商务提供大数据平台，最终实现以产品和服务的线上交易为特征的广义O2O（包括狭义的O2O、B2C和B2B）商务模式。
用户终端：机构际客的VIP用户在Web端有独立的登录入口vip.gcall.com，在移动端有独立的APP应用软件“机构际客”。
音视频技术：实时音视频通信服务采用世界先进的下一代流媒体技术和具有自主知识产权的专有信令服务器。
商业目标：为中国的企业机构提供社交化的广义O2O整体解决方案。
证书和知识产权：原创自主知识产权。
控股公司：中文：际客网络股份有限公司，英文：GCALL.COM LIMITED。
国内运营：时代际客（深圳）软件有限公司，时代全球（深圳）科技有限公司。

际客用独创的12位际号（4000开头的）系统为机构提供集团际号。基于集团际号，为机构提供7层级的主页管理系统。通过7个层级的主页系统，实现机构的信息发布、产品发布、形象展示、内部通信和管理，以及机构与机构、机构与个人的实时社交互动。主页系统的权限管理是机构的部门管理和人员管理的实景映射。每个主页可以代表一个机构的部门或关联的下级机构，也可以代表某个级别的主管或员工。不论是机构的部门、下级机构还是个人都通过一个机构默认主页（顶级主页）所创建的自建主页表示。各主页具有不同的管理权限，每一级主页的集合都可以由代表个人的主页和代表部门的主页混合构成。
机构默认主页可以把下面任意一个主页和之下的主页集合移动到另外一个主页之下，也可以把一个主页或整个主页集合关联到另外一个主页，授予这个主页对关联过来的主页或主页集合行使相关的管理权限。通过移动和关联，一个机构的默认主页可以随时改变机构主页集合的结构和权限，使N层级主页系统与机构本身的结构和管理权限同步。
机构际客的用户使用4000开头的12位际号，一个VIP机构用户，最多可被授予包含10,000个际号的际号集合，可以创建9,999个不同层级的自建主页，内部的实时音视频可以通过只拨打12位际号的最后4位数字实现。
VIP机构用户的每个主页都集成了社交（SNS）和集合式通信（UC）模块，既可以方便地进行内部通信和管理，也可以与际客大平台上的其它机构和个人用户通信互动。VIP机构默认主页和自建的每一个下级主页系统都能够发布产品、招聘、投融资和采购信息，使用音视频模块，实现远程视频面试，扩大人才招聘的地域范围，降低招聘的机会成本，利用全景展示平台开展营销活动，扩展商务边界，促进线上线下交易。
机构际客 APP 是设计独特的移动客户端，是一个集成了社交、IM、IP 电话和邮箱4 大功能的广义O2O客户端。注册用户仅需一个 APP 就能够处理机构内部管理、信息发布、电子商务、社交互动、实时聊天、拨打 IP 电话和收发邮件，省却在多个不同的 APP 之间跋涉的烦恼。用户可以使用方便好记的际号登录，一号通全网。APP的音视频电话可以实现网络环境下的语音和视频全球免费拨号通话。APP的邮箱具有全球首创的无址通邮功能。
机构际客的VIP用户基于际客独创的际号，以分层级的主页系统实施机构内部管理、信息发布、内外部通信和社交互动，实现大数据平台条件下社交化的广义O2O商务模式。
机构际客系统拥有多项全球领先的创新，具有原创的先进性和唯一性。其中，机构际客APP是全球唯一的集社交和集合式通信四大功能于一身的O2O商务应用软件，使用的流媒体音视频技术被国际专家誉为下一代的互联网数字通信技术。机构际客理念领先，产品独创，技术先进，是互联网领域难得一见、具有原创领先性的超大型广义O2O平台。

results.description:
BlueTie App brings you the all-new objective-based networking, where mutual synergy leads to effective professional collaborations.
Save yourself the hassles of network building! Get unlimited access to thousands of professionals looking for someone like you.
Search for freelance opportunities, a mentor or discuss your start-up idea with a prospective business partner, work your way towards your big dreams by networking on BlueTie.
Networking is evolving with time. Keeping in mind the changing needs, we have developed the algorithm for the app - flexible, smart and secure.
 
Here are some Key Features that will help you achieve your professional goals:

Networking based on your objectives:
Streamline your professional networking and make it more effective by meeting professionals based on your networking objectives.

Get searched for who you are:
Display all your fortes and get discovered for opportunities based on your skills, software expertise and certifications. With us, get known for every talent you have. Be it a creative pursuit or a more conventional career, we've got you covered.

Search easy and smart with our Advanced Filters:
Make your search more precise with the help of our Smart Filters and get in touch with the relevant professionals. If you are looking for a web developer from a specific city, who is open for job opportunities, you could achieve it through our smart filters.

Privacy ensured with a BlueTie Pin:
No more sharing your contact details and inviting spams! BlueTie Pin is the unique professional contact detail that makes you easily discoverable on the app. Share it with professionals who mean serious business and you are good to go.
 
How to make the most of BlueTie?
• Fill in all your details as a 100% completed profile will increase your chances of appearing in search results.
• Be active on the app and try Reaching Out to relevant professionals to not miss out on any possible collaborations.
• Update your Fortes and Objectives regularly as per your current needs.
• Subscribe to our premium plan to unlock added perks.
 
We now have more reasons to celebrate in 2019 and we’re happy to see that our hard work is getting recognised. The year began with BlueTie receiving the Fastest Growing Indian Company Excellence Award at the International Achievers Conference in Thailand. Also, we are happy to be featured on some of the top publications - YourStory, Economic Times, India Today, Business Today among others.

---------------------------------------------------

BlueTie App is free to use and download. Upgrade your account to one of our premium plans - BlueTie Opportunity, BlueTie Possibility or BlueTie Infinity to unlock exclusive benefits that come along with the respective plans. BlueTie premium plans are priced between INR 499 to INR 799 per month. You can also opt for our quarterly and annual subscriptions. The benefits and pricing are clearly listed in the App. Payment will be charged to User's iTunes account on confirmation of the purchase. Once confirmed, there will be no refunds if you cancel the subscription. Any unutilised benefits for the currently active plan will not be carried over to the next period. Subscription to another plan will overwrite the currently active plan. Since there is no auto-renewal option, the user needs to manually renew their subscription, once it has expired.

https://www.bluetieglobal.com/privacy-policy
https://www.bluetieglobal.com/terms-of-use
